imdb.title: Naruto
imdb.plot: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

episodes.title: He Appears! Naruto Uzumaki
episodes.plot: Welcome to Konoha, where deadly ninja roam the land and the mischievous Naruto Uzumaki causes trouble everywhere he goes. But when he steals the ancient scroll of sealing, he unleashes a rare power rarely seen in a 12-year-old boy.

episodes.title: My Name is Konohamaru!
episodes.plot: Naruto finally graduates from the Ninja Academy and claims to know it all. Well, at least that's what he tells Konohamaru, Konoha's Hokage grandson.

episodes.title: Shukuteki!? Sasuke to Sakura
episodes.plot: On the way to becoming a ninja, Naruto must team up with his classmates, the pretty Sakura and the pretty serious Sasuke, whose common bond is that they both hate Naruto. So Naruto will try a different approach.

episodes.title: Shiren! Sabaibaru enshû
episodes.plot: The recently formed Team 7 (Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke) meet their instructor, Hatake Kakashi, and begin training to see if they pass to the next stage of ninja training. Kakashi tells them to engage in the following exercise: try and take two bells away from him using their ninja knowledge.

episodes.title: Shikkaku? Kakashi no ketsuron
episodes.plot: With the threat of failure hanging over their heads, Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura try everything they know to pass the grueling survival test. But it will take some wise advice from Kakashi to teach these selfish ninja a thing or two about teamwork.

episodes.title: Jûyô ninmu! Nami no kuni e chô shuppatsu!
episodes.plot: Naruto and his squad start their first ninja missions with boring and menial tasks. Weary and angry, Naruto vents his frustration at the Hokage. Amused by Naruto's excitement, he gives them a new mission, to protect a grumpy old man named Tazuna as he returns to his home!

episodes.title: Kiri no asashin!
episodes.plot: Naruto and his squad arrive in the Land of the Waves and learn that an evil businessman named Gato has taken over the land. Zabuza Momochi appears, hired by Gato to kill Tazuna. Excited and ready to attack, Naruto can't wait to take on this powerful ninja assassin. Will he be up to the challenge?!

episodes.title: Itami ni chikau ketsui
episodes.plot: Kakashi has the upper hand in his battle with Zabuza. But the tide turns when Kakashi is trapped inside Zabuza's Water Prison! Kakashi urges the squad to flee, but Naruto remembers the pledge he made--to never run away again--and holds his ground!!

episodes.title: Sharingan no Kakashi
episodes.plot: Thanks to Naruto's ingenious plan, Kakashi is freed from the water prison. Kakashi is ready to use his Sharingan against Zabuza.

episodes.title: Chakura no mori
episodes.plot: Recuperating at Tazuna's house, Kakashi is dissatisfied with the outcome of the battle. He concludes that Zabuza isn't dead and the young tracking ninja helped Zabuza escape! Kakashi decides to implement some interesting training that will allow Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura to better control their chakra!

episodes.title: Eiyû no ita kuni
episodes.plot: Sakura goes into town with Tazuna and sees the hardships that the people of the Land of Waves suffer under Gato's rule. This is the reason Tazuna is risking his life to build a bridge that crosses the ocean. With a bridge that gives everyone access to other lands, people will no longer have to rely on Gato, who controls all imports. Meanwhile, Naruto and Sasuke continue to train, using chakra to climb a tree.

episodes.title: Kyôjô kessen! Zabuza futatabi!!
episodes.plot: While Naruto concentrates on the training to control his chakra, a mysterious person suddenly appears before him. The person tells Naruto that as long as one has the desire to protect what he loves, there is no limit to becoming stronger. The mysterious figure echoes the sentiment inside Naruto and the two feel a sense of connection.

episodes.title: Haku no hijutsu: Makyô hyôshô
episodes.plot: Once again, the time has come to fight Zabuza, and this time he's got company -- the tracking ninja who supposedly killed him. Zabuza and his companion take notice of Sasuke's abilities, and Sasuke in turn realizes the immense power that the masked ninja holds. As if they were meant to fight each other, Sasuke and the masked ninja begin to battle.

episodes.title: Igaisei No.1, Naruto sansen!
episodes.plot: Sasuke finds himself in a pinch inside of Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors, but Naruto comes to the rescue. But Sasuke has a plan to counter Haku's jutsu with attacks from both the inside and outside the Crystal Ice Mirrors, and Naruto's unexpected action ruins Sasuke's strategy. Eventually, both young ninja are trapped.

episodes.title: Shikai zero no tatakai Sharingan kuzushi
episodes.plot: Realizing time is of the essence, Kakashi decides to use the Sharingan once again to defeat Zabuza.

episodes.title: Kaihôsareta fûin
episodes.plot: Naruto and Sasuke continue to receive punishing attacks from within Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors. Naruto can no longer stand on his feet. But during the intense battle, Sasuke starts to realize the power of his own Sharingan and gradually starts to elude Haku's assault. Haku decides to finish them off immediately. Sasuke is caught off guard by Haku's action and uses his own body to shield Naruto...

episodes.title: Shiroi kako: Himeta omoi
episodes.plot: Naruto finally explodes. His anger against Haku, who defeated Sasuke, unleashes the power of the Kyûbi. Naruto's chakra becomes so intense that even Kakashi and Zabuza, fighting in the distance, take notice. Haku is unable to do anything in the face of Naruto's hidden power.

episodes.title: Shinobi to iu na no dôgu
episodes.plot: Haku tells the hesitant Naruto to finish him off. Naruto strongly questions Haku's philosophy of existing only to fight and win. Meanwhile, the battle between Kakashi and Zabuza approaches its climax. Zabuza's movement is restrained by Kakashi's Summoning Jutsu. With victory within his grasp, Kakashi unleashes his most devastating maneuver.

episodes.title: The Demon in the Snow
episodes.plot: Zabuza is no longer Kakashi's enemy, and thanks to a little speech by Naruto about how ninja are, Zabuza takes on Gato's men single handily. The Demon of the Hidden Mist takes his vengeance on Gato and all of those dumb enough to follow him, and apologizes to Haku for what he did to the kind little boy. After the group takes care of the rest of Gato's men, Zabuza asks Kakashi one final request, to see Haku one final time. This is Zabuza's requiem.

episodes.title: Shinshô totsunyû! Chûnin shiken dattebayo
episodes.plot: With their latest mission complete, it's time once again for the group to go back to mediocre missions. After all are done, Konohamaru and his friends pay a visit to Naruto. All which result in being chased by Sakura. Everyone is soon over though, as two mysterious ninja block their way, and one of them isn't too happy with Konohamaru. Sasuke arrives to save the day, but the leader of the group shows up, with stealth skills that surprise even Sasuke. Meanwhile, the Third Hokage announces that it's time once again for the Chuunin selection exams.

episodes.title: Nanore! Arawareta kyôteki tachi!!
episodes.plot: After the three ninjas take their leave, Sasuke realizes he has a powerful rival out there. The next day, Kakashi announces that he has recommended all of them for the Chuunin Exams. While Naruto and Sasuke are pleased, Sakura is afraid of letting everyone down. Also, someone decides they aren't ready and decides to test their abilities.

episodes.title: Kiai 120% nau de Rokku na chôsen-jô!
episodes.plot: The eccentric Rock Lee challenges Uchiha Sasuke to a battle before the Chuunin Exam begins.

episodes.title: Kechirase raibaru! Rûkî 9 zenin shûgô
episodes.plot: All Konoha Genins are put to an introductory test to determine who will continue on in the actual exam.

episodes.title: Ikinari shikkaku? Chô nankan no dai ichi shiken
episodes.plot: All Genins meet together and begin a written test as part of the first Chuunin Exam.

episodes.title: Deta toko shôbu! Funbari dokoro no 10 monme
episodes.plot: The Genins work on gathering information furtively while worries over the tenth question surface.

episodes.title: Zettai hikken! Shi no mori chokuzen rupo! Konoha no gakkyû shinbun da kore!
episodes.plot: A Naruto Special which recaps the previous 25 episodes and sets the stage for the second Chunnin exam.

episodes.title: Daini shiken sutâto! Mawari wa min'na teki darake!
episodes.plot: The second Chuunin Exam begins as the Genins start their search for two scrolls to enable them to finish the second Exam.

episodes.title: Kû ka kuwareru ka! Esa ni natta Naruto
episodes.plot: The Genin teams continue their search for the two scrolls in the Forest of Death. Meanwhile, Team 7 is sidetracked by a powerful enemy.

episodes.title: Naruto hangeki! Nigenên dattebayo!
episodes.plot: Naruto and the rest of Team 7 continue their fight against their ruthless enemy in the Shi no Mori.

episodes.title: Yomigaere Sharingan! Hissatsu: Katon - Ryûka no jutsu!
episodes.plot: Sasuke finally recovers his will to fight and receives a dangerous "present" from Orochimaru. The emergency surrounding Orochimaru in Konoha spreads to village officials.

episodes.title: Geki mayu puratonikku! Boku wa shinu made anata o mamoru!!
episodes.plot: Rock Lee and Sakura must defeat the Sound Genin in order to protect Naruto and Sasuke.

episodes.title: Sakura saku! Ketsui no ushirosugata
episodes.plot: The Sound Ninja attack incapacitated Team 7 and Sakura is left to fight them all.

episodes.title: Muteki no fômêshon! InoShikaChô!!
episodes.plot: Team 10 gains the courage to help Sakura defeat the Sound Genin.

episodes.title: Akamaru bikkuri! Gaara, kyôi no jitsuryoku
episodes.plot: The other Genin teams continue their search for the scrolls and Gaara's power is revealed to Team 8.

episodes.title: Nozoki mi genkin! Maki mono no himitsu
episodes.plot: Naruto muses peeking into his team's scroll and Kabuto joins Team 7 in order to reach the tower in the center of the Forest of Death.

episodes.title: Bunshin taiketsu! Ore ga shuyaku dattebayo!
episodes.plot: Team 7 and Kabuto engage the Rain ninja after breaking through the Rain ninjas' illusionary technique.

episodes.title: Dai ni shiken toppa! Seizoroi rûkî nainu!
episodes.plot: Team 7 recovers their final scroll and completes the second Chûnin exam. However, a preliminary exam to the third Chûnin exam must be held to weed out the best Genins.

episodes.title: Gôkaku-sha nibun no ichi!? Ikinari shiai dattebayo!!
episodes.plot: Kabuto is secretly revealed to be a traitor to Konoha and Sasuke starts his match against Yoroi Akado.

episodes.title: Geji mayu jerashî! "Shishi rendan" tanjô!
episodes.plot: Sasuke continues his fight against Yoroi Akado despite the pain from his Cursed Seal. Kakashi decides to help Sasuke after the battle by sealing the Cursed Seal.

episodes.title: Isshoku sokuhatsu!! Kakashi VS Orochimaru
episodes.plot: Kakashi performs the sealing ritual on Sasuke, while the fight between Zaku Abumi and Shino Aburame commences.

episodes.title: Raibaru gekitotsu! Otome kokoro wa honki môdo
episodes.plot: Misumi Tsurugi fights Kankuro and Sakura and Ino Yamanaka finally are forced to battle each other.

episodes.title: Besuto batoru wa Shânnarô!!
episodes.plot: The battle between Sakura and Ino intensifies as friendships and hardships between the two are revealed.

episodes.title: Shikamaru tajitaji!? Kunoichi-tachi no atsuki tatakai
episodes.plot: The third preliminary exam continues with Temari fighting Tenten and Shikamaru Nara battling Kin Tsuchi.

episodes.title: Akamaru sansen!! Makeinu wa dotchi da?
episodes.plot: Naruto finally gets his chance to fight against Team 8's Kiba Inuzuka.

episodes.title: Hinata sekimen! Kankyaku anguri, Naruto no okunote
episodes.plot: Naruto's fight against Kiba draws to a climax and Naruto's newest "techinque" is introduced.

episodes.title: Byakugan kaigan!! Uchiki na Hinata no daitan ketsui!
episodes.plot: Neji Hyuga and Hinata Hyuga fight to defend the honor of themselves and of their families.

episodes.title: Akogare no hito no me no maede!!
episodes.plot: Hinata decides to prove her worth against Neji as the battle between the two draws to a close.

episodes.title: Gaara funsai!! Wakasa da! Pawâ da! Bakuhatsu da!
episodes.plot: The youthful Rock Lee clashes against the powerful and deadly Gaara of the Sand.

episodes.title: Nekketsu ochikobore! Tsuini sakuretsu, kindan no ôgi!
episodes.plot: Rock Lee keeps fighting against the ferocious Gaara. Lee is weakened due to the use of his technique, Omote Renge, but his will is strong. In order to defeat Gaara, Lee would open the first gates, to be able to use a forbidden technique.

episodes.title: Aa Rokku Rî! Kore ga otoko no ikizama yo!!
episodes.plot: Lee finally reveals his trump card, the power of the Eight Gates, while Gaara prepares for a bloody showdown.

episodes.title: Yami ni ugomeku kage Sasuke ni semaru kiki!
episodes.plot: Choji Akimichi versus Dosu Kinuta in the final match of the third preliminary exam. Naruto learns he is getting a new trainer to prepare for the third Chuunin Exam.

episodes.title: Ebisu futatabi! Harenchi wa watashi ga yurushimasen zo!
episodes.plot: Naruto, in preparation for the third Chuunin Exam, begins his training with Ebisu, with some unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: Aiya shibaraku! Ero-Sen'nin tôjô!
episodes.plot: While Ebisu trains Naruto on how to walk on water in a hot spring, he spies somebody trying to peep on women in a hot spring. Ebisu attacks him, only to be defeated quickly. Since Naruto's teacher has been knocked out, Naruto demands that the stranger become his teacher instead, but he has other plans. Naruto's Sexy Jutsu may be just the thing to get this pervert's attention.

episodes.title: Ero-Sen'nin jikiden kuchiyose no jutsu dattebayo!!
episodes.plot: While Jiraiya attempts to teach Naruto the Summoning Jutsu, while doing research as well, Dosu learns the hard way why Gaara is so dangerous. Meanwhile, Baki and Kabuto secretly meet and reveal a sinister plot against Konoha. When Hayate discovers this dark secret, he attempts to warn the Hokage. However, he'll have to get through Baki first!

episodes.title: Setsunai omoi negai o kometa ichirin
episodes.plot: Naruto keeps training on his 'kuchiyose no jutsu' skills, with little improvement, while Jiraiya-sensei prefers to focus his attention on 'researching for his next book', sneaking, looking the young women. In a meeting with the Hokage, it is told about the murder of Hayate Gekkô, the possible implication of Orochimaru and the Otogakure, but the Third Hokage decide to keep running the Chûnin Exams. Sakura is worry about Sasuke-kun and the 'Ten no Juin' Orochimaru left him. She tries again to visit him at the hospital, but first she stops at the Yamanaka flower shop. ...

episodes.title: Sei ka shi ka!? Menkyo kaiden wa inochi gake!
episodes.plot: Naruto finally learns how to summon the frog and release the power of the nine tails.

episodes.title: Tonda! Haneta! Mogutta! Gama oyabun tôjô!!
episodes.plot: Naruto aims to prove to the frog boss that hed has summoned him. The sand villages' true motives become clearer.

episodes.title: Shinobi yoru ma no te! Nerawareta byôshitsu
episodes.plot: Naruto wakes up in the hospital, after three days of recovering. He meets Shikamaru there, who went visit Chôji. Meanwhile, Sakura goes to visit Lee, and notices there's no one in the hospital reception. She feels something strange after changing Lee's flowers, but she sees nothing, so she leaves to visit Naruto. But the awkward presence is still there, and is a real danger: Gaara.

episodes.title: Môretsu môtsui môdasshu honsen kaishi dattebayo
episodes.plot: The Second Part of the Chûnin Exams is about to begin. As every Genin who passed the first test is getting ready, Naruto feels really nervous. He meets Hinata who, timidly, wishes him the best. Naruto feels better, but as he get closer to the Arena, he finds some trouble to get on time.

episodes.title: Byakugan vs Kage bunshin! Ore wa zettê katsu!!
episodes.plot: Everyone is ready for the final part of the Chûnin Exams. Sasuke and Dosu hasn't arrived yet, so the referee, Jônin Genma Shiranui explains that if they don't arrive in time for their matches, they will be disqualified. This worries Sakura. First match is Naruto Uzumaki vs Neji Hyûga. Most audience members are betting for Neji, but Sakura and Hinata have faith in Naruto. Could the orphan boy, despised by most, defeat the talented and well trained member of the Hyûga Clan?

episodes.title: Shikaku zero! Mouhitotsu no zettai bougyo
episodes.plot: Naruto begins his assault with his Shadow Clones but Neji analyzes Naruto's actions and determines the real one. Unable to figure out why Naruto won't admit his defeat, he takes off his headband and reveal a mysterious mark on his forehead. Neji reveals the truth about his hatred towards the main family of the Hyuga Clan.

episodes.title: Ochikobore no sokojikara!
episodes.plot: Naruto and Neji's battle continues with Neji showing enormous power.

episodes.title: Shikkaku!? Kiken! Maedaoshi! Haran bukumi no daihonsen!
episodes.plot: Neiji is visited at the hospital by his uncle Hiashi to tell the truth about his father death.

episodes.title: Kumo wa ii naa... yaruki zero no otoko
episodes.plot: Shikamaru fights to Temari on final part of the Chûnin Exams. Shikamaru personality is explained. This is a battle of strategy more than power.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Konoha mai suna ugomeku toki
episodes.plot: With Sasuke and Gaara's match needing to start, the Third Hokage (Hiruzen Sarutobi) sets a time limit for Sasuke to arrive. Sasuke arrives at the last minute with Kakashi Hatake.

episodes.title: "1 jikan buchi nuki de Sasuke ga ô abare dattebayo supesharu": Arashi o yobu otoko!! Sasuke no gejimayu-ryû taijutsu!
episodes.plot: Sasuke and Kakashi has finally arrived. Now it is time for the match between Sasuke and Gaara.

episodes.title: "1 jikan buchi nuki de Sasuke ga ô abare dattebayo supesharu": Date ni okureta wake janai! Kyûkyoku ôgi - Chidori tanjô!!
episodes.plot: Sasuke's enhanced speed and taijutsu skills enable him to bypass Gaara's sand-based defenses with ease, as Rock Lee did previously. Determined to kill Sasuke, Gaara retreats inside a sphere of sand and begins to transform.

episodes.title: "Konoha kuzushi" shidô!
episodes.plot: Orochimaru takes Hiruzen hostage as he has his personal bodyguards, the Sound Four, establish a barrier to so no one would interfere. Kankuro and Temari carry Gaara from the village so that he can recover with Sasuke in pursuit.

episodes.title: Matte mashita! A ranku ninmu dattebayo!!
episodes.plot: Kakashi instructs Sakura to wake Naruto and Shikamaru, and send them to an A-Rank mission: alongside ninja dog Pakkun, they must trace Sasuke to aid him in his fight against the Suna siblings. Meanwhile, Orochimaru begin his battle against his former sensei, Sandaime Hokage Sarutobi.

episodes.title: Nigegoshi No.1 Mendokuse~ ga yarukkya nê!!
episodes.plot: Pakkun informs Sakura, Naruto and Shikamaru that they are being followed by 9 Otogakure shinobi. Thinking about a strategy to delay the enemy, Shikamaru offers himself as bait.

episodes.title: Kokon musô! "Hokage" toiu reberu no tatakai
episodes.plot: Orochimaru uses Edo Tensei and the fight between Shodai Hokage and Nidaime Hokage against Sandaime Hokage Sarutobi begins. Orochimaru reveals some of his true intentions.

episodes.title: Hokage no ayamachi Kamen ni shita no sugao
episodes.plot: Sasuke catches up with the Suna siblings and Temari battles him, so Kankurô can take Gaara to recover. Meanwhile, Sandaime Hokage Sarutobi remembers the past and is finally ready to defeat Orochimaru.

episodes.title: Kinjutsu ôgi! "Shiki fûjin"
episodes.plot: Third Hokage decides to use the last resource at his disposal, the same technique that in the past has saved the village of the leaf, meanwhile Sasuke reaches Kankuro and Gaara, a new battle promises.

episodes.title: Kyôkaku! Gaara no shôtai
episodes.plot: the predestined duel between Shino of the clan Aburame and Kankuro begins, while Gaara regains his strength but "something" inside him is awakening.

episodes.title: Genkai o koete... Sasuke no ketsudan!!
episodes.plot: The battle between Gaara and Sasuke continues and the monster inside the sand boy seems to feed on his old wounds. To neutralize the powerful opponent, the pupil of Kakashi goes beyond his limits with devastating consequences.

episodes.title: Tsukiyo no ansatsusha
episodes.plot: Through Gaara's migraines we discover his tormented childhood and from where his illness of life began. Meanwhile, Naruto decides to face him to protect his best friends.

episodes.title: Hikari to yami Gaara to iu na
episodes.plot: Yashamaru explains the truth to Gaara about his existence; Naruto tries to protect his friends while contemplating his and Gaara's similarities.

episodes.title: Bakuhatsu! Korezo Naruto ninpouchô
episodes.plot: Naruto unleashes his handbook on Gaara and Gaara's true form is revealed.

episodes.title: Rimitto bucchigiri!: Hikari to yami
episodes.plot: Once all women and children are evacuated, the Hidden Leaf Village launches its counter attack; Naruto defeats Gaara and Orochimaru has something precious taken from him.

episodes.title: Sandaime yo, towa ni......!!
episodes.plot: The villagers of Konoha unhappily go to the funeral of The Third Hokage.

episodes.title: Asagiri no kikyou
episodes.plot: While the people of Konoha are trying to rebuild the village and go back to their normal lives, the appearance of two mysterious man threatens to disturb the newly-found peace.

episodes.title: Sharingan vs Sharingan!!
episodes.plot: While Naruto prepares to go on a new adventure, Kakashi struggles to fight fellow Sharingan-user Itachi, former ninja of Konoha Village and member of a mysterious organization.

episodes.title: Oo, nô! Jiraiya no jonan, Naruto no sainan
episodes.plot: Naruto starts his journey with Jiraiya, while Sasuke is angry and frustrated, because of the progress shown by his team-mate during the fight against Gaara.

episodes.title: Unare Chidori Hoero Sasuke
episodes.plot: Naruto is surprised by the arrival of the two Akatsuki members, while Sasuke thinks back to the day he saw his brother for the last time.

episodes.title: Orokanaru otouto yo urame, nikume!
episodes.plot: The arrival of Jiraiya saves Naruto from Kisame's attack, while Sasuke fights his brother and learns the strength difference between them.

episodes.title: Shugyou kaishi Ore wa zettê tsuyokunaru!
episodes.plot: Naruto and Jiraiya continue their journey in search of Tsunade and decide to stop in a city to rest, there, the toads hermit teaches a new technique to Naruto.

episodes.title: Konjou!!! Warero mizufuusen
episodes.plot: Under Jiraiya's tutelage Naruto learns to train like a ninja and not a kid, by himself.

episodes.title: Konoha mâku to hitai ate
episodes.plot: Naruto progresses in his training as Jiraiya is closer to tracking down Tsunade; but Orochimaru is after her too.

episodes.title: Hamon
episodes.plot: Naruto continues with the third phase of his training to learn a new technique, while Orochimaru meets Tsunade and asks for her help.

episodes.title: Ikari bakuhatsu! Yurusanêttebayo
episodes.plot: Jiraiya and Naruto finally find Tsunade as she groans within herself contemplating Orochimaru's offer.

episodes.title: Shodai Hokage no isan Shi o yobu kubikazari
episodes.plot: Naruto learns Tsunade's story.

episodes.title: YES ka! NO ka! Tsunade no kaitô
episodes.plot: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimaru's offer. Her hesitation to promptly refuse leads Kabuto to assume she'll take the offer.

episodes.title: Kôshô ketsuretsu!!
episodes.plot: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimaru's tempting offer. But seeing Nawaki and Dan's dreams carried on by Naruto, she breaks off the deal. Orochimaru is determined to heal his arm and focuses on exploiting Tsunade's weakness.

episodes.title: Kurae! Ikari no Rasengan
episodes.plot: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi. Naruto also attempts a summoning jutsu, but ends up with Gamatatsu, Gamakichi's younger brother. Meanwhile, Kabuto has defeated Shizune. Naruto approaches Tsunade who is trembling in fear! Seething with anger, Naruto pulls himself up and tries to attack...

episodes.title: The Fifth Hokage! A Life on the Line
episodes.plot: Naruto's ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death. Tsunade places her last shred of hope in Naruto who shares Nawaki and Dan's dreams. Tsunade has a fear of blood, but through her desire to protect Naruto, she is able to overcome it.

episodes.title: Sansukumi no tatakai
episodes.plot: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins. Jiraiya and Tsunade join forces against Orochimaru. Despite her injuries, Tsunade desperately challenges Orochimaru. The toad, snake and slug engage!

episodes.title: Naruto no yukemuri chin dôchû
episodes.plot: Naruto help some guys make Tsunade pay her debt and Jiraiya spends the day in a spa waiting for pretty girls.

episodes.title: Tsunade's Warning: Ninja No More!
episodes.plot: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than of that of a shinobi.

episodes.title: Hi no ishi o tsugumono
episodes.plot: Tsunade gets to work as the fifth hokage and Konohamaru acts out of turn.

episodes.title: Nekketsu shitei no kizuna ~ otoko ga nindô o tsuranuku toki ~
episodes.plot: Guy sensei encourages Rock Lee by reminding him of his ninja way.

episodes.title: Mitai, shiritai, tashikametai Kakashi sensei no sugao
episodes.plot: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.

episodes.title: Iza shinninmu Giri to jinjou to chakoku o sukue!
episodes.plot: Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke find out their newest mission will be without Kakashi who has responsibilities elsewhere. Tsunade sends them to the Tea Country to protect someone, but the details are vague at best. Along the way they meet Idate Morino who causes the group a lot of trouble, especially when they discover who they have to protect.

episodes.title: Naruto gekichin!? Inbou uzumaku daiunabara
episodes.plot: The trio continue to follow Idate while fending off attacks by three Shinobi sent to kill him. They find out later just how important winning this race is to the Wasabi clan's future.

episodes.title: Hashire Idate! Arashi o yobu haran no Nagishima!!
episodes.plot: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.

episodes.title: Gôru chokuzen! Raimei todoroku daigekitou
episodes.plot: With Naruto's help, Idate reaches the Modoroki Shrine - But just as he's about to cross the bridge, an old nemesis stands in his way.

episodes.title: Todokuka Idate! Shinnen no rasuto supâto
episodes.plot: Now that Sasuke and Sakura are trapped at the bottom of a cliff, it's up the Number One Knucklehead Ninja to defeat the malevolent Aoi and help Idate cross the finish line.

episodes.title: Omae to tatakaitai! Tsui ni gekitotsu, Sasuke vs Naruto
episodes.plot: Hospital bound and feeling his pride shattered, Sasuke finds there is only way to redeem himself: Battle Naruto. Meanwhile, the Ino-Shika-Cho Squad sit down for some barbecue to celebrate a special occasion.

episodes.title: Mienai kiretsu
episodes.plot: As their rivalry reaches a fever pitch, Kakashi-sensei breaks up the battle and sends Naruto and Sasuke to their corners. Meanwhile, Four Sound ninja enter the Hidden Leaf Village with only one thing on their mind - Sasuke.

episodes.title: Oto no sasoi
episodes.plot: Sasuke takes on all four Sound Ninja, but soon learns it's going to take more than Chidori to defeat them.

episodes.title: Kessei! Teppeki no fômêshon
episodes.plot: Now that word of Sasuke's departure has spread to the Fifth Hokage, she calls upon the newest Chunin, Shikamaru, to put together a squad to bring Sasuke back to the village.

episodes.title: Sesshoku Otoyoninshuu no jitsuryoku
episodes.plot: The Sound Ninja have Sasuke in their clutches and it's up to the Hidden Leaf Village's top Shinobi to stop them.

episodes.title: Ikinari nakamaware? Shikamaru shoutai pinchi
episodes.plot: As Shikamaru and the rest of the squad move in, Jirobo, one of the Sound Ninja, traps them within an Earth Dome Prison and sucks up their chakra.

episodes.title: Pawâ zenkai! Moero chouji
episodes.plot: Upon breaking free from the Earth Dome Prison, The Sasuke Retrieval Squad realize they don't have enough chakra to take on Jirobo - but Choji's got another idea up his sleeve.

episodes.title: Saraba tomo yo...! Sore demo ore wa shinjiteru
episodes.plot: With his life on the line against the Sound Ninja Jirobo, Choji looks back on the seeds of his friendship with Shikamaru. Can he defeat his fearsome opponent without any Chakra?

episodes.title: Omae no aite wa kono ore da!
episodes.plot: Hot on Sasuke's trail, Shikamaru and his squad get caught up in a web of unparalleled chakra when they tangle with the six-armed Kidomaru.

episodes.title: Shikai 360 do Byakugan no shikaku
episodes.plot: Neji takes on Kidômaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.

episodes.title: Makerarenai riyuu
episodes.plot: Neji's on the run from Kidomaru's bow and arrow attacks. Will Neji make it out alive or will his new-found enemy hit his blind-spot dead on?

episodes.title: Dakkan: Ma ni awanakatta utsuwa
episodes.plot: In pursuit of the Sound Ninja, Naruto, Kiba and Shikamaru strike at dawn to retrieve Sasuke and bring him back to the Hidden Leaf Village.

episodes.title: Shissaku! Aratanaru teki
episodes.plot: Naruto, Kiba and Shikamaru intercept Sasuke from the Sound Ninja Four, but little do they know that another ninja from the Sound Village has been dispatched to grab Sasuke as well.

episodes.title: Unare! Hoero! Kyuukyoku no taggu
episodes.plot: Faced against the vicious twin duo of Sakon and Ukon, Kiba and Akamaru team up to take them out, using their most powerful jutsu.

episodes.title: Sorezore no tatakai
episodes.plot: With the Sasuke retrieval squad now split into individual battles, it's up to Naruto, Kiba and Shikamaru to stop the sound ninja. But little do they realize that there's more to their opponents than their basic techniques.

episodes.title: Feiku! Otoko Shikamaru Kishi kaisei no kake
episodes.plot: Shikamaru's got his hands full with Tayuya and her melodic attacks. Can he stop her and put an end to her malevolent flute playing?

episodes.title: Konoha no aoki yajuu kenzan!
episodes.plot: Naruto's Shadow Clones are no match for Kimimaro's attacks. But when an old bushy-brow-ed buddy from the Leaf Village shows up, all bets are off.

episodes.title: Yajuu sakuretsu! Hajikero futtobe tsukinukero!
episodes.plot: Rock Lee's back and he's full of a special medicine that has Kimimaro on the run. Can he take out the fifth Sound Ninja?

episodes.title: Konoha doumeikoku Suna no shinobi
episodes.plot: Down for the count and at the mercy of the Sound Ninja, Kiba, Shikamaru and Rock Lee get help from an unlikely bunch of new allies.

episodes.title: Saikyou taiketsu! Gaara vs Kimimaro!!
episodes.plot: Itching to fight and with a sense of guilt from the past, Gaara tells Rock Lee to stand down and let him take on Kimimaro. Meanwhile, Naruto continues on his quest to catch the runaway Sasuke.

episodes.title: Shuunen no ichigeki! Sawarabi no mai
episodes.plot: As Gaara demonstrates he has more than enough backbone to take on Kimimaro, Orochimaru recollects on how he brought him as a young man into the Sound Village.

episodes.title: Todokanai sakebi
episodes.plot: Finally catching up to Sasuke, Naruto does all he can to keep him from going to Orochimaru. Does he have enough strength to stop him or is Sasuke gone for good?

episodes.title: Itachi to Sasuke Toosugiru sonzai
episodes.plot: Naruto and Sasuke face off in battle as we get a glimpse into Sasuke's past where his achievements were ignored by his father and his brother Itachi's behavior began to take a turn for the worst.

episodes.title: Chichi to ko Hibiwareta kamon
episodes.plot: As Sasuke squares off against Naruto, he reflects on his past when he was neglected by both his stern father and Itachi, his brooding older brother.

episodes.title: Kaigen Mangekyou sharingan no himitsu
episodes.plot: While Naruto is busy underwater, Sasuke remembers the fateful day in which his clan was killed. He remembers why Itachi spared his life, and why Itachi did what what he did. Now, in order to gain the same power as his brother, he must kill his closest friend...Naruto.

episodes.title: Tomoyo!
episodes.plot: Kakashi learns the truth about the chase after Sasuke, and orders his dogs, including Pakkun, to go find Naruto and Sasuke. However, things are looking grim as the clash between the Chindori and the Rasengan ensues. The attacks are even, causing Naruto and Sasuke to both fly back. Naruto finally realizes how serious Sasuke is, and gets the snot beat out of him while he remembers how he always wanted to be friends with Sasuke.

episodes.title: Namida no houkou! Omae wa ore no tomodachi da
episodes.plot: Naruto proves to be too much for Sasuke to handle as Naruto fights back with renewed vigor. Finally acknowledging Naruto's strength, Sasuke puts on his forehead protector, symbolizing both as equals. But when Sasuke's Sharingan is upgraded to level 3, the tables turn on Naruto. Just when all hope seems lost for Naruto, he undergoes a startling transformation, but will it be enough?

episodes.title: Namidaame no ketsumatsu
episodes.plot: The battle between Naruto and Sasuke comes to a close, as One-Tailed Naruto takes on Cursed Seal Level 2 Sasuke in one final Rasengan vs. Chidori clash. And this time...only one person will emerge victorious. Will Kakashi and Pakkun make it in time? And who is this mysterious ninja watching everything?

episodes.title: Mamorenakatta yakusoku
episodes.plot: Shikamaru's group is brought back to Konoha with many injuries. Neji and Chouji could possibly die, Kiba has a deep wound but nothing too serious, and Naruto and Shimakamru have a few injuries. When Sakura finds out they are back ,she goes immediately to see Sasuke and Naruto but finds out Sasuke got away. Can Naruto keep his promise to Sakura? And what news does the Jiraiya have for Naruto?

episodes.title: Deep Cover?! A Super S-Ranked Mission
episodes.plot: Jiraiya begins to worry about Naruto and Sakura's well-being. He then requests that Tsunade send them on a mission with him. He finds Naruto telling Sakura he is not going to stop her from going after Sasuke, but he is going with her, and tells them about the mission. They head off to Rice Country to find the Hidden Sound Village, and hopefully Sasuke as well.

episodes.title: Bugaisha no machi Fuuma ichizoku no kage
episodes.plot: Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya end up in a town that is even worse than the one they were chased out of. Jiraiya heads off and leaves Naruto and Sakura to get some food. Along the way they find the ninja that attacked them before, but things are not as clear-cut as they might seem.

episodes.title: Kiyoki uragiri Hakanaki negai
episodes.plot: When Sasame drugs the gang, she prepares to hand them over to Orochimaru. But, when she discovers that they are to be killed, she has a change of heart.

episodes.title: Kyoufu! Orochimaru no yakata
episodes.plot: Sasame leads Naruto, Jiraiya, and Sakura to Orochimaru's hideout. They send Sasame back to the village because of the danger level. Jiraiya summons Gamakichi to go in first and investigate. The four come to three tunnels. Jiraiya goes off to the right, Naruto and Sakura down the middle and Gamakichi down the left. Will the four of them make it past the traps?

episodes.title: Futatsu no kodou Kabuto no wana
episodes.plot: Naruto arrives in the nick of time to save Sakura, but not before Kabuto tells her that Sasuke is dead. Naruto attacks but ends up tangled in a deadly trap of Kabuto's. Is it all over for our hero and will they find Arashi?

episodes.title: Sakura no ketsui
episodes.plot: The battle between Naruto and Arashi continues, but Naruto's injury is making it difficult for him to succeed. Sasame jumps in to try to save Naruto but will it be enough?

episodes.title: The Three Villains from the Maximum Security Prison
episodes.plot: With the events of the Rice Field Country behind them, everyone prepares for their training. But a new threat soon arises. Remember Mizuki? He's back and he's planning to break out of Konoha's Correctional Facility, along with two stupid, fat brothers..

episodes.title: Hashire Tonton! Omae no hana ga tayori dattebayo
episodes.plot: Shizune pursues Mizuki who has escaped from the Maximum Security Prison, but is overcome by him and the brothers Raijin and Fujin. - This Episode is part of Season 3, Volume 3

episodes.title: Shinsei sanningumi Futari to ippiki!
episodes.plot: Naruto is having trouble with the two brothers and Iruka is having his share of difficulties with Mizuki. Iruka struggles to try and get the old Mizuki back but he doesn't have much success. - Meanwhile, when things are looking bleak for Naruto, can 3 friendly Ninja save the day?

episodes.title: Sakuretsu! Nyû fômêshon inoshikachou
episodes.plot: Naruto's backup has arrived and they are Shikamaru, Ino, and Chouji. They tell Naruto that they will take care of the brothers. Naruto leaves to catch up to Iruka, who is fighting Mizuki. Can Naruto arrive before Mizuki kills Iruka? And can Shikamaru, Ino, and Chouji hold off the brothers?

episodes.title: Nokosareta yabou Orochimaru no kage
episodes.plot: Naruto and his squad start their first ninja missions with boring and menial tasks. Weary and angry, Naruto vents his frustration at the Hokage. - This Episode is part of Season 1, Volume 1

episodes.title: Innen no taiketsu! Omae ni ore wa taosanee
episodes.plot: Mizuki is determined to make Naruto and Iruka suffer and it appears that he has the upper edge with his improved strength and speed. Shikamaru, Ino and Chouji are also at their limits and now Fuujin and Raijin are free. Can Tsunade arrive in time to help?

episodes.title: The Search for the Rare Bikochu Beetle!
episodes.plot: Naruto is unable to search for Sasuke due to Tsunade's orders, while Kiba and Hinata wonder how they can help him out. Shino remembers a special type of bug that if it is found, could easily track Sasuke down. they go and discuss it with Tsunade, who agrees to let them search for it, making Shino the leader. Tsunade discovers Naruto eavesdropping the conversation and lets him go with them. But, can they complete a mission with only a 10% success rate? As they travel, Naruto has difficulty dealing with Shino's bizarre behavior. Hinata also sneaks out in the middle of ...

episodes.title: What's the Difference? Don't All Insects Look Alike?
episodes.plot: The group struggles to find a Bikouchuu, but seem to fail at every turn. When it starts to rain they realize they only have one more chance to find it, will Hinata's Byakugan be enough?

episodes.title: A Battle of the Bugs! The Deceivers and the Deceived!
episodes.plot: With Hinata's safety in danger, the group must try and figure out a way to save her and protect the Bikouchuu at the same time. Every time one side seems to have an edge though, the other reveals yet a new trick. As dawn approaches, they don't have long left....can they succeed?

episodes.title: Blaze Away, Byakugan! This Is My Ninja Way!
episodes.plot: With the group trapped, Shino makes a deal to trade the Bikouchuu for Hinata. Unfortunately for the opponents, Hinata got away, making the deal worthless. They begin to attack but can Hinata show up to save the day?

episodes.title: Sei aru mono e no sousoukyoku
episodes.plot: When Naruto rescues three strangers he finds himself dragged into yet another mission. However, this time he doesn't want to partake in it. That is until he hears that there might be a connection to Akatsuki. With Neji, Lee and Tenten as his teammates, will he find the information he is looking for?

episodes.title: Kokoro ni todoke! Ai no tekken
episodes.plot: Out to try and save Rourusuke, Naruto and the others ambush members of the Kurosuke Family and save an old man. They soon hear the funeral bell and go and save Rourusuke. However, Rock lee meets an old friend among the group, and Lee must now convince Kurashi to return his his old way of life. Their time together is cut short, as Raiga watches from the sidelines. Can Naruto, Neji, Rock Lee, and Tenten defeat an enemy that not even Neji's Byakugan can see?

episodes.title: Byakugan no tenteki
episodes.plot: Naruto, Tenten, Neji and Lee continue their mission to stop Raiga and save the Rourusuke Family. They try to work out a plan but the thick fog makes it difficult for them to see. Even Neji's Byakugan doesn't seem to help. Lee fights Raiga and manages to knock a bag off his back. What is this bag and what is inside it that seems so important? Meanwhile Naruto steps up to battle Raiga. Will he be able to defeat him?

episodes.title: Shinobi yoru an'un
episodes.plot: Naruto, Neji, Rock Lee, and Tenten continue their fight against Raiga

episodes.title: Gyakushuu no raiga
episodes.plot: The group discovers that Ranmaru and Karashi are missing from the curry shop.

episodes.title: Hashire!!! Seimei no karê
episodes.plot: Lee is left facing Raiga alone while Tenten and the others hurry to bring them the curry of life. Ranmaru is reunited with Raiga, but are things the same as they were before?

episodes.title: Follow My Lead! The Great Survival Challenge
episodes.plot: Every Genin is assigned a squad of Cadets to lead on a mission that forces all of them to race to the top of a mountain to retrieve a scroll and, wouldn't you know it, guess who Naruto ends up leading? Its none other than the Konohamaru corps. However, when a storm causes the mission to be canceled without his knowing, he will have to be a better leader than ever to keep his team alive.

episodes.title: The Bounty Hunter from the Wilderness
episodes.plot: Naruto, Hinata and Kiba are sent off on a mission to capture a thief named Gosunkugi. However, on the way they meet another bounty hunter, who is after the same target as them..

episodes.title: Eru ka erareru ka!? Okkêdera no kettou
episodes.plot: Turns out Sazanami is really a wanted criminal named Toukichi who is wanted for the murder of a family of three. Truth is however, he's innocent, and wants to capture the man responsible to prove it. Sazanami teams up with the Konoha group to stop Gosunki once and for all..

episodes.title: Sankyaku kenzan Ao no Yajuu? Moujuu? ...Chinjuu?
episodes.plot: As Gai and Lee leave Konoha on a mission, two strangers disguise themselves as them and sneak into the village to learn its secrets. Tsunade, Sakura and Tenten have big plans in store for these impostors, plans that'll make their lives miserable.

episodes.title: Shiroki noroi no musha
episodes.plot: Naruto, Tenten, and Neji travel to the Bird Country to exterminate a ghost named Noroimusha.

episodes.title: Sakushi Koumei no omowaku
episodes.plot: Naruto and the others attempt to prove that Kouhmei is the one responsible for the ghost. However, what Naruto and the gang discover leaves even more mysteries unsolved.

episodes.title: Ososugita suketto
episodes.plot: Naruto decides to do some investigating on his own over the matter of the ghost, while Neji and Tenten try a different approach. With the help of two frogs, Naruto begins to learn more and more about the truth of the matter....but will what he discovers, cost him his life?

episodes.title: Naruto shisu
episodes.plot: Kakashi orders Neji and Tenten to return to the village with him, much to their protest. Meanwhile Koumei is about to be executed, at least until the Noroimusha shows up. Is the ghost an ally or an enemy and whatever became of Naruto? Questions are answered as Sagi reveals the truth.

episodes.title: Todomatta mama no jikan
episodes.plot: Sagi prepares his plans for revenge and he won't let anyone stand in his way. Disguised as the Noroimusha, he confronts Musou, but shocking news is revealed when they both reveal their true identities.

episodes.title: Shirasagi no habataku jikan
episodes.plot: Shima saves Naruto from Ooki's genjutsu trap and proceeds to try and protect him. When all seems lost for our hero, a mysterious white figure appears and asks him to grant one last wish. Will Naruto find the strength to grant this request and save the day?

episodes.title: Moero Zundou! Mazete nobashite yude agero!
episodes.plot: Mr. Ichiraku, the owner of the Ichiraku Ramen shop is in trouble. His daughter has been kidnapped and he only has two days to win her back. Can Nauruto, Chouji and Sakura help Mr. Ichiraku win the contest, or will he have to hand over his Legendary Ramen recipe?

episodes.title: Kioku Ushinawareta pêji
episodes.plot: Being some of the few Genins available, Naruto, Ino, and Shino are forced to accompany Anko on her mission to the Sea Country to destroy a sea monster and protect a boat carrying gold. However, Anko is acting strange as she begins to remember more and more events from her past, and the connection she once had with Orochimaru.

episodes.title: Shougeki Tozasareta doa
episodes.plot: Naruto is recovering thanks to the mysterious girl, Isaribi. While Naruto is recovering, Anko, Shino, and Ino search for him and also meet the man in charge of the payroll shipment. The group eventually meets back up, but not before finding the sea monster's lair.

episodes.title: Sennyuu Shikumareta torappu
episodes.plot: After Isaribi escapes, Naruto and his team decide to go to the forbidden island and confront Orochimaru and his subordinates. They soon discover that Orochimaru is not the man behind the curtain, but a man known as Amachi. Amachi is the one responsible for turning Isaribi into a monster, so why is she helping him?

episodes.title: Zetsubou Hikisakareta hâto
episodes.plot: After narrowly escaping the collapsing lab, Naruto and the others must catch up to the money convoy. However, Amachi has already set his trap, and the convoy crew has taken the bait. Naruto and the others arrive to save the day, as all of them prepare for battle. But can the group defeat Amachi when he reveals his true self? And what will happen when Isaribi realizes how far Naruto will go to save her?

episodes.title: Kaisen Tokihanatareta pawâ
episodes.plot: Naruto and Amachi's battle comes to a rather quick end, or does it? Also, Anko recovers more of her past including a significant event.

episodes.title: Arienêttebayo! Serebu ninpou Kinton no jutsu
episodes.plot: Naruto guides Kunijiro, a young rich boy visiting Tsunade, through a day in the life of a ninja.

episodes.title: The Treasure Hunt Is On!
episodes.plot: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are ordered on a special mission: A treasure hunt. There is a downside though; if they fail the mission, they have to go back to the Academy. They set off confident that the mission will be easy, but still worried about having to go back to the academy. Everything is going as well as expected until some mysterious characters show up. Can Naruto and crew find the gold, or will they have to go back to the Academy with the other little kids?

episodes.title: Run, Dodge, Zigzag! Chase or Be Chased!
episodes.plot: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata must make it back to Konoha and stop their evil look-a-likes from ruining their village. The impostors think it'll be an easy task, but when the real Naruto and Kiba expose their weakness, they discover that it may not be so easy.

episodes.title: Oh!? Purîzu Misutâ Posutoman
episodes.plot: Naruto accidentally meets up with Jiraiya and demands that he trains him. Jiraiya refuses however, as he has to finish the next volume of his series. Anxiously wanting to train, Naruto tries to help and as usual, it all goes wrong. Naruto and Jiraiya vs the Courier Ninja, who will come out on top?

episodes.title: Deai 'Hoshi' no na o motsu shounen
episodes.plot: About 200 years, a star fell to the Hidden Star Village. This star supposedly as mystic powers. However, the village has few ninja, so they require the help of other villages. Naruto accompanies Lee, Neji, and Tenten on a mission to protect it.

episodes.title: The Remembered Lullaby!
episodes.plot: When the mysterious attacker flies away with the star, using only their Chakra, the Konoha group are left in the dust. They swear to reclaim the star but it isn't as simple as they might hope. Meanwhile, Naruto learns some of Subaru's history and Natsuhiboshi.

episodes.title: Hidden Jutsu! The Price of Ninja Art: Kujaku
episodes.plot: The Konoha team continue to investigate the star's theft and start to realize everything is not quite as it seems. Everything seems to be leading to a final battle, but who is the real enemy behind all this?

episodes.title: Hoshikage: The Buried Truth
episodes.plot: Naruto has been rescued by the mysterious woman and soon learns who she really is. Can the two of them continue the mission the was started so very long ago and what will Subaru think when he discovers the truth?

episodes.title: Reunion: The Remaining Time
episodes.plot: Subaru finally meets his mother, but is it too late for them? Can Naruto defeat Akahoshi and stop the star from falling back into his hands, and what side will the village choose to take?

episodes.title: The Star's Radiance
episodes.plot: After Akahoshi tries to execute Sumaru, Hakato and the rest of the children stand up to protect their village. Akahoshi, finding the village turning against him, takes drastic steps to ensure his success. Naruto is the only one left who can take down this menace, can he do it alone? or will he find help from someone more powerful..

episodes.title: Kiba's Long Day
episodes.plot: When Akamaru is taken ill and starts to undergo a mysterious transformation, can Kiba do anything to save his friend? When the whole village appears to be against him what lengths will he go through, to protect his friend?

episodes.title: A Legend from the Hidden Leaf: The Onbaa!
episodes.plot: While Naruto is training an eagle drops a creature on his back known as an Onbaa. Naruto has to take care of this creature because it won't let go of his back.

episodes.title: Warau Shino
episodes.plot: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funderal, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testment! - This Episode is part of Season 4, Volume 2

episodes.title: Open for Business! The Leaf Moving Service
episodes.plot: Naruto, Hinata, and Chouji are chosen on a mission to protect some peddlers running away from a war at the Greenery Country. However, Tsunade gave them more than just a simple guard duty mission, making them movers as well. The peddlers are just simple folk, who were never even registered citizens in the country. But, when Naruto discovers the group is being pursued, the three ninja realize that there is more going on than meets the eyes.

episodes.title: Mystery of the Targeted Merchants
episodes.plot: The group splits off into two, in an attempt to deter their mysterious attackers. However, when Naruto and Chouji discover the plan hasn't worked as intended, they soon realize that somebody is hiding something important..

episodes.title: Limitless Supply of Ninja Tools
episodes.plot: Naruto, Chouji, and Yurinojou take on Ruiga, who uses water as a weapon. Ruiga has the power to draw out water from the Earth, giving him an unlimited supply of ninja weapons. How can they defeat an opponent who has a limitless supply of water? Even if they can win, can they defeat the second ninja, Jiga? Also, what is the Princess' true motive for running away?

episodes.title: The Byakugan Sees the Blind Spot!
episodes.plot: With Naruto defeated, Hinata decides to join the fight. Will she be able to defeat the second evil ninja? And what of the princess?

episodes.title: Shi no senkoku 'Kumori tokidoki hare'
episodes.plot: The battle with the third and final evil ninja is on. He has only one desire and that is to kill Princess Haruna. Will Naruto be able to defeat this new menace and save Haruna?

episodes.title: Ino Screams! Chubby Passion!
episodes.plot: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores. - This Episode is part of Season 4, Volume 3

episodes.title: Viva Dojo Challenge! Youth Is All About Passion!
episodes.plot: When Naruto returns from a mission, he discovers that Lee has set up a Dojo and is desperate for a challenger. When Gai discovers nobody has challenged him he steps up to the plate. However, a last minute change in plans throws changes everything, and when an impostor joins the fray, chaos ensues..

episodes.title: The Mysterious Curse of the Haunted Castle
episodes.plot: Naruto, Hinata, and Kiba are sent to the Land of Honey to search for the Daimyo's wife. There, they find an eerie castle, and journey inside to search for clues.

episodes.title: Daisan no choujuu, saidai no raibaru
episodes.plot: When Lee misses his check-up with Tsunade, Naruto is sent to find him. Meanwhile Gai is training someone called Yagura and has decided that Lee and Yagura should have a training match. Can Lee beat the new trainee after hearing some uncomfortable news at his examination?

episodes.title: Hot-Blooded Confrontation: Student vs. Sensei
episodes.plot: Gai is trapped inside a fortress made of practice posts. Yagura appears but is he there to help or to hinder? Naruto, Neji and Tenten show up to try and rescue Gai, but will it be too much for them to handle on their own?

episodes.title: Crisis: The Hidden Leaf 11 Gather!
episodes.plot: Naruto meets an old man, a construction worker named Gennou. However, when Gennou steals plans for some of the buildings in Konoha, Naruto suddenly finds himself under investigation by the ANBU. What is the truth behind Gennou and why does nobody seem to know what is going on?

episodes.title: The Anbu Gives Up? Naruto's Recollection
episodes.plot: In order to get the information they need about Gennou, the ANBU put Naruto in a trance, hoping to prong the information they need from Naruto's memory. However, even by doing all of this, will they get the information they need?

episodes.title: The Missed Target
episodes.plot: Naruto and the others continue their search for any clues leading to Gennou or his plan. During an investigation of the Ninja Academy, they discover a suspicious training post which leads to an even scarier discovery.

episodes.title: The Powerful Helper
episodes.plot: With the city of Konoha mapped in explosive tags, a decision must be made weather to try and remove them, or to evacuate the entire city. However, something is strange about these tags, can they discover what it is? And can they remove all of them in time?

episodes.title: Tajuu torappu Hokai no kauntodaun
episodes.plot: While Shikamaru tries to figure out what Gennou is planning next, Naruto is fighting Gennou in the Great Stone faces. Can Shikamaru stop Gennou's next step in the plan before it is too late? And will Naruto be able to defeat the Trap Master?

episodes.title: Honjitsu happyou! Ase to namida no besuto 5! Otanoshimi no bangai-hen mo aru-ttebayo supesharu
episodes.plot: Naruto and Sakura host a special recap episode featuring the top five battles so far. There are also interviews with some of the team, and perhaps even some of the enemy..

episodes.title: Kurenai no ketsudan Torinokosareta dai 8-han
episodes.plot: Naruto encounters a girl named Yakumo who has a surprising talent for destruction. Shortly after, Kurenai Yuhi, leader of Team 8 makes a startling decision and Naruto is determined to find out why.

episodes.title: Nerawareta Yakumo Fuuin sareta nouryoku
episodes.plot: Naruto sneaks into Yakumo's mansion in the night, and has a dream that Kurenai threatened to seal Yakumo's abilities. He then discovers that this is the reason why she left the team, but Kurenai refuses to disclose any more. As Kurenai goes to see Yakumo, several Kurama Clan members attack.

episodes.title: Kurenai no gokuhi ninmu: San-daime tono yakusoku
episodes.plot: As Kurenai attempts to escape with Yakumo, Naruto and Sakura, Team 8 and Might Gai arrive to lend their assistance. We learn some of the history between Kurenai and Yakumo and discover why things have turned out the way they have.

episodes.title: Genjutsu-ka genjitsu-ka Gokan wo seisuru mono
episodes.plot: Naruto, Kurenai, Yakumo and Team 8 return to Konoha to a shocking discovery. Can this really be reality or is it all some kind of sick illusion?

episodes.title: Fujirareta hazu no nouryoku
episodes.plot: Naruto and the members of Team 8 head into Yakumo's house to find her with Kurenai. It is revealed that a mysterious entity might be behind all this. Can the group discover the truth in time?

episodes.title: Meiki Kachou fuugetsu no omosa
episodes.plot: Naruto and Kiba are ordered to escort a man named Shinemon who is transporting a rare and valuable artifact. However, when Bandits steal the artifact, can the pair retrieve it and keep Shinemon alive?

episodes.title: Teki wa 'Shinobazu'
episodes.plot: Naruto, Sakura and Lee are sent to escort a prisoner named Gantetsu to the Forest Country Capital. Their job is only to back up the escort group in case something goes wrong, which inevitably, it does..

episodes.title: Mayoi no mori
episodes.plot: With the ship split in half, Naruto, Todoroki and Gantetsu are separated from the others. Now Naruto must face the other three Shinobazu that Gantetsu was with. Can Naruto lead them out or will they have to trust Gantetsu to lead the way?

episodes.title: Honoo no kioku
episodes.plot: Todoroki wants to avenge his family and kill Gantetsu. The only problem is that Naruto has other ideas. Elsewhere, Lee and Sakura are surrounded by children who are demanding they give them Gantetsu. Can Naruto and Todoroki get Gantetsu back? And what are the children's reasons for wanting him?

episodes.title: Sorezore no michi
episodes.plot: Naruto arrives to save Gantetsu and the kids but has trouble when Akio is kidnapped and Todoroki realizes his brother is alive. Will Naruto and Todoroki be able to save Akio?

episodes.title: Ushinawareta kioku
episodes.plot: Naruto rescues a kid who was injured but he is an outsider to Konoha. Tsunade assigns Naruto to take care of the kid until he gets his memory back. What was this kid doing outside of Konoha and why can't he remember anything?

episodes.title: Torimodoshita genjitsu
episodes.plot: Naruto and Menma manage to get Tsunade to let them go find Menma's memories. However, they are forced to go with Neji and Tenten guarding them. On the way, they come across a burned-down village. There, they greet the villagers and ask them what happened. Unfortunately, the villagers aren't too happy to see them.

episodes.title: Keshisaritai kako
episodes.plot: Ran wants to kill Menma, upon seeing the mark on his arm, but Neji stands in the way, saying it would be unfair to kill a criminal without any memories of his crimes. Ran finally agrees and performs surgery on Menma, saving his life, but the villagers aren't as happy. Are they prepared for when foreign shinobi group comes for a second attack?

episodes.title: Kieta takumi Nerawareta Shukaku
episodes.plot: A Sand shinobi, Matsuri, has been abducted by a mysterious ninja. In order to bring them bring back, Gaara must accept the mystery ninja's challenge. Can Naruto prevent this challenge ending in catastrophe?

episodes.title: Suna no doumeikoku Konoha no shinobi
episodes.plot: The rogue ninjas continue running as Gaara, Temari and Kankuro give chase. At the same time, Shino, Hinata and Neji are using their abilities to try and find the Shitenshounnin. Who will end up fighting first and, who will ultimately win?

episodes.title: Fuujiwareta suna Suiko no hangeki
episodes.plot: Shikamaru and Ino arrive to help out Temari against Kyaku, while Kiba and Chouji go to help Konkuro. All seems to be going well until Neji notices something odd.

episodes.title: Yomigaetta kyuukyoku heiki
episodes.plot: Although his comrades are defeated, Jin puts his final plan in motion by using Gaara to revive Seimei. To do this, he traps Gaara in a metal sphere that starts draining his chakra. Gaara partially transforms into the One-Tailed Shukaku--which is what Jin wanted all along. Jin then performs a ritual and sacrifices his own body to Seimei's corpse, which allows Seimei to be reincarnated. Seimei then takes up the weapons of the Shitenshonin, therefore becoming the "ultimate weapon" of Takumi Village. Naruto does battle with him until Gaara bursts out of the metal sphere, ...

episodes.title: Tabidachi
episodes.plot: Naruto recovers from his latest battle and Jiraiya takes him on a journey to begin his training away from Konohagukre.
